title: ? instead of é
content: I'm a French Canadian and working for a US base Co. I have both Keyboards set-up in my Pixel. The problem is when I send sms in French, all specials characters like "é", "à", "è" or else the contact will have those characters replaced my "?". I tried with Message App and Messenger from Facebook has the default message app, same things. Setting of my phone is in French
